metadata.title: Relaxso Lavender Shoe Deodorizer (Pack of 2), Natural Bamboo Lilac
features: Shoe shaped inserts come in pairs to place in any shoes or boots to release naturally a fresh clean scent designed to counteract protein-based foot odors
Soft feel bamboo fabric selected specially for freshness usage leading to health benefits and environmental responsible
Filled with lavender buds to act as a medium to capture more essential oils
Banish foot odors and perfume shoe storage areas and can also be used to perfume clothes and linen in small spaces
Perfect with two golden string to make them easy to keep track of and easy to hold with hanger in your wardrobe
description: Our whimsical lavender sachets can keep shoes smell fresher and healthier anywhere at home. They're not just for shoes though, one can put them in places like lingerie sweater & drawers or even hang them in a closet. Please try our deodorizer to remove bad odour and make your environment more fresher, drier and healthier. Our shoes deodorizers came in a natural lavender scent while helping your shoes in maintaining their shape. Each packet contains two sachets joined together with golden string to make them easy to keep track of and easy to hang.
